WSUS31 KKCI 131155 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 28E 
VALID UNTIL 1355Z 
WV OH 
FROM 50SSW AIR-20NNE HNN 
LINE TS 20 NM WIDE MOV FROM 23035KT. TOPS TO FL290. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 131355-131755 
AREA 1...FROM 150SE SIE-170ESE ECG-130SSE ILM-40W PIE-210S 
CEW-100ESE LEV-CLT-PSK-150SE SIE 
REF WW 115 116 117 118. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM MSS-30SE PVD-150SE SIE-PSK-50ENE BWG-50S 
DXO-BUF-30ESE YYZ-30NW SYR-MSS 
REF WW 118.

PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
